text: Spelling the Dream is a 2020 documentary film directed by Sam Rega and written by Sam Rega and Chris Weller and starring Srinivas Ayyagari, Jacques Bailly and Valerie Browning. The premise revolves around competitive spelling bees, who are dominated by Indian-Americans. The film follows the life of four kids: Akash Vukoti, Tejas Muthusamy, Ashrita Gandhari and Shourav Dasari. The documentary also features Sanjay Gupta, Kevin Negandhi, Fareed Zakaria, Pawan Dhingra, and Hari Kondabolu. == Release == Spelling the Dream was released on June 3, 2020, on Netflix. == References == ==External links== * * Category:Netflix original documentary films Category:2020 documentary films Category:2020 films
title: Spelling the Dream
